amendment.description: To collect more than $500,000,000 from developers for failed, botched, and abandoned projects.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 795 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 795 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6808-6809; text: CR S6809) To collect more than $500,000,000 from developers for failed, botched, and abandoned projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 795 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.
